vidis.data.sim
Class AComponent

java.lang.Object
  vidis.data.sim.AComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAComponentCon, IComponent, IVariableChangeListener, IVariableChangeProducer, IVariableContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimLink, SimNode, SimPacket
public abstract class AComponent
extends Object
implements IComponent, IAComponentCon, IVariableChangeListener

this is the abstract component superclass that implements all basic functionality for a simulator component like node, packet and link. the concrete implementations can be found at referenced locations

Author:
Dominik
See Also:
SimLink, SimNode, SimPacket
